metadata.title: CVE-2024-6285 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Integer Underflow (Wrap or Wraparound) vulnerability in Renesasarm-trusted-firmware. An integer underflow in image range checkcalculations could lead to bypassing address restrictions and loading ofimages to unallowed addresses.

criterions.comment: arm-trusted-firmware package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
